column1: I've been using this product for about 2 weeks now. My skin feels so soft and silky. I'm already seeing changes in my skin tone too. I was at the grocery store and someone stopped me and said how beautiful my skin was. I'm anxious to see what this product can do after using it for 4 weeks!

First week I saw results, I had deep wrinkles above my lips, the creases are less noticeable, I have tried other products but they did not seem to work well at all. I can see results with this, so we will give it a few more weeks. It could only get better..
Easy to apply, creamy not greasy. Easy to apply foundation over top. Noticed a difference in overall face within 1 wk.
this is great-i love it,skin looks better

I've been using these products, including this triple power serum for about 3 years now... I am 50 & have been told repeatedly that I don't look it. I don't have wrinkles, but wanted to get some products to hopefully help in the "natural aging" process with keeping it away as long as I can & as much as I can. I feel these products really help with that . I do recommend & will keep on recommending.

The serum worked great! Most moisturizers feel heavy and greasy on my skin, but this one was so light and airy, I didn't realize I used it, until about a week later when I noticed a significant difference in my skin! It's a lot smoother, softer, and much more hydrated. Highly recommended, great value for the price!

I have sensitive skin and like how my skin feels with this product. It is non-greasy and has not caused any breakouts, which sometimes happens with anti-aging creams. I've only used the product for about two weeks, so haven't quite noticed a reduction in wrinkles. I have however, noticed that my skin is softer so will continue to use.
It's lightweight and refreshing! Only issue I have is the pump stopped working halfway through the bottle, had to use the pump straw to get the remaining product out.

I find that when I use it everyday my skin reacts. My face gets some pinkish burnt-like blotches and feels sensitive. It could be allergic reaction. I have temporarily stopped using it, but will try again.
My skin is very dry, and I didn't find this product relieved it. Adding a day cream did help though, and I noticed that I didn't have to use as much of it.

I purchased this product last week and I am very pleased thus far! My fine forehead lines are diminishing! The lines were deeper, but I also believe staying hydrated goes along way. I would be shocked if they totally disappeared, but right now I am happy with the results. I have to get up close into the mirror to see them. I have used other products, but this product has given me an instant change!!

I read recently that if over 50 you should really consider a serum instead of a cream. Even though I stay out of the sun now, earlier in my life I was constantly in the sun and now have the damage. After the first use I noticed a difference. Been using for a week now and I can tell a big difference. I have a glow that is incredible. Been using on face and neck and am tempted to start using on my hands. This product is the best I've ever used.....and believe me, I've tried them all. I am a fan for life.

Loved the product. It does smell good, makes your skin perky and smells pleasant so that you can put it on right before bed even if your boyfriend hates when you smother your face with creams. It penetrates fast & feels light. Can be worn with makeup, sunscreen & extra layer of daily cream on top. Does not break out sensitive areas. A value product.

I have been using for a few weeks, it felt good, not greasy or heavy. Than i started to notice my pores were clogging and had to stop. I was breaking out with blackheads where i never had before. I never spend the money (kids come first) for face creams and now i have one i cant use. Disappointed.....

I have been using this serum for about a week now and have already noticed my skin texture getting better. My skin feels more even tone than it was a week ago! This serum is very light and wont clog pores, which is always my biggest concern with products like these. Plus, Walmart has the best price!!
so far, in just a week, i have noticed a big difference in my skin, wrinkles disappearing and skin looks fresher and brighter! cant wait until i have used it for a month.

I'm currently using this serum and I'm really happy with the results so far, my facial texture looks more even and smooth. The serum is light not sticky and moisturizing it has almost no scent to it and so far I haven't had any reactions

I have been using this for just 3 weeks and already see a difference. Less fine lines, my skin is so smooth. Product is light weight, no heavy scent, I highly recommend everyone to try it !!!

This product deserves an A+

Love how it feels and smells. Seems to do the job

I love using this on my face at night. It makes face so smooth.
fast results
